<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update manufacturer"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/{ManufacturerId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing manufacturer's details. Only the fields provided in the request body will be modified.

**Prerequisites**
- **ManufacturerId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) to find the manufacturer. Extract `Items[].ManufacturerId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List manufacturers: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturers) â†’ find target manufacturer
2. (Optional) Get current details: [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturer-by-id)
3. Update: [POST /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/update-manufacturer) with modified fields

**Updatable Fields**
- `Name` - Manufacturer display name
- `Scope` - "Global" or "Site" (changing scope may require elevated permissions)
- `EsoIsVisible` - Toggle Employee Self-Service portal visibility
- `Icon` - Font Awesome icon class

**Notes**
- Include `ManufacturerId` in the request body matching the path parameter
- Changing a manufacturer's name does not affect existing assets or models referencing it
- Scope changes may affect visibility at other sites

**Related Endpoints**
- [GET /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/get-manufacturer-by-id) - Get current manufacturer details
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/assets/manufacturers/\{ManufacturerId\}](/docs/api/manufacturers/delete-manufacturer) - Delete manufacturer

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ManufacturerId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the manufacturer to update","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Manufacturer data to update","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request payload for creating or updating a manufacturer","properties":{"ManufacturerId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the manufacturer (required for updates, omit for creation)"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Site identifier if the manufacturer is site-scoped"},"Scope":{"type":"string","description":"Defines the visibility scope for a manufacturer","enum":["All","System","Global","Site","App","User","Role","Team"],"title":"ManufacturerScope"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the manufacturer"},"LogoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"File identifier for the manufacturer's logo image"},"Icon":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"CSS icon class for display purposes"},"EsoIsVisible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the manufacturer is visible in the External Service Order portal","default":true},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","description":"Set to true when creating a manufacturer by duplicating an existing one","default":false}},"title":"UpdateManufacturerRequest"},"example":{"ManufacturerId":"a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-abcd-ef1234567890","Name":"Dell Technologies Inc.","Scope":"Global","EsoIsVisible":true}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
